A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Had a strong dislike for this movie.  It had some funny moments and a couple neat scenes.  Had good Special Effects.

plotwise it did nothing for me.  

The chase was boring and could have been so much better.  See the Battlestar galactica reboot.

The Vegas Vacation was boring and pointless.  

Poe is way too good in an x-wing vs pilots in previous movies and his x-wing seems too agile.  Just bothers me.

The REBEL commander was lame.  Every other rebel commander shared the plan with everyone.  She doesn't\, creates a rebellion within her own ranks\, blames everyone else and has a meaningless death.  Autopilot or a Droid could have done that.

DIDn't really like Luke's story ark either.  I don't think it's true to the luke from the original trilogy.
